div.p: JACKSONVILLE, FLORIDA OCTOBER 12th, CAESARS PALACE IN VEGAS ON
MILLER AND I HAD A GREAT TIME IN PORTLAND, OREGON IN SPOKANE OVER
THE WEEKEND. THERE WAS A GREAT HISTORICAL
EXHIBITION BUT ON THERE THAT FEATURES PRESIDENTIAL DOCUMENTS.
TRULY AMAZING STUFF AND YOU GET RIGHT UP AND CLOSE TO IT AND
THEY GOT THE LITTLE INTERACTIVE THING.
YOU PRESS A BUTTON. THEY TELL YOU ALL THE HISTORY OF
IN SPOKANE THE GUYS GAVE ME A TOUR OF EASTERN WASHINGTON.
A BEAUTIFUL PLACE. I HAD NEVER VISITED SPOKANE AND
THAT AREA BEFORE. THAT WAS THE ONLY MAJOR AMERICAN
CITY I HADN'T SEEN SO NOW I HAVE BEEN EVERYWHERE AND SEEN EVERY
MAJOR CITY. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, CHECK OUT
YOUR COUNTRY. EVERY STATE HAS FABULOUS PLACES
TO SEE. I'M PROUD I HAVE SEEN MOST OF
THE USA AND I HAVE LEARNED AN ENORMOUS AMOUNT BY DOING SO.
AND FOLKS, I LOVE TALKING TO THE FOLKS.
OKAY. THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT.
